Title: Get Smart
Writer: Tom J. Astle, Matt Ember, Mel Brooks (characters), Buck Henry (characters)
Actors: Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Dwayne Johnson, Alan Arkin
Plot: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.
Production: Mosaic Media Group, Callahan Filmworks, Mad Chance
